data.name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger Vol.8 Ending Theme Song
data.detailed_description:
Ending Theme Song for Grisaia Phantom Trigger vol.8.
The tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV (high-quality) format.

1. Aprilis leaves
Lyrics ：Yoshikazu Kuwashima
Composition＆Arrangement：Hajime Kikuchi
Vocals：eufonius

2. Aprilis leaves (Off vocal)

3. Aprilis leaves (instrumental)

MP3:192kbps
WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
